NYC - Paperless Post / Onsite / Visa

Sr. Software Dev - https://www.paperlesspost.com/about/jobs/479639

Paperless Post is seeking software engineers to help build and refine a sophisticated platform with a deep network of over 100 million users. You’ll work on all parts of the development cycle, in many different areas of code, and on constantly releasing features as part of a deeply collaborative team with a robust development process. Working with a cross-disciplinary team, you’ll build and support a reliable, scalable product while balancing requirements and complexity.
